content.en: Celiac Diagnosis Advancements: Researchers have been investigating the challenges in diagnosing celiac disease and how to improve the accuracy of its diagnosis. They have found that serologic tests, along with specific algorithms, can help identify celiac disease. Additionally, new screening tests and diagnostic algorithms are being proposed to enhance the detection of celiac disease.
content.da: Fremskridt i cøliakidiagnostik: Forskere har undersøgt udfordringerne ved diagnosticering af cøliaki og hvordan man kan forbedre nøjagtigheden af diagnosen. De har fundet ud af, at serologiske tests sammen med specifikke algoritmer kan hjælpe med at identificere cøliaki. Derudover foreslås nye screeningtests og diagnostiske algoritmer for at forbedre påvisning af cøliaki.
